channel.title: emacs on Life inside a computer

item.title: Coleslaw migration
item.description: This marks my third(?) migration to a new site format! ðŸŽ‰ I’ve recently started learning to use Emacs after leaving the Emacs manual lying around for the better part of a year. Since I’ve decided to try my hand at some common lisp I figured it would be a good time to start learning, and my goodness I wish I’d started this sooner. As part of this new experience I started looking into ways I could use Lisp in my everyday life.
